title: Thumbelina
description: Librarian's note: This is a newer and different adaption to Bernice Dyer's Thumbelina, using a selection of Petula Stone's illustrations from that edition.Part of the Ladybird Tiny Treasures series with glossy pictorial boards. Four to Five inches tall. A retelling of the Hans Christian Andersen tale by Audrey Daly
author: Audrey Daly
